channel.title: SevenAtSevenSportsAndEntertainment
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSportsAndEntertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nev Schulman Back Riding Bike After Near-Fatal Crash

item.title: Baylor Wearing White Jerseys On Saturday To Spoil Colorado’s “White Out”
item.description: Both Colorado and Baylor announced they'll wear all-white uniforms for Saturday's game in Boulder. So, who has to change?
